title: The Monster of Medomsley: Episode 36
itunes:subtitle: In this episode of the UK True Crime Podcast we head to County Durham in the North East of England.  When Neville Husband died at the age of 72 he appeared to be quite unremarkable in every way.  But in his life, Husband, 'The Monster of Medomsley'  ha...
content:encoded:
In this episode of the UK True Crime Podcast we head to County Durham in the North East of England. When Neville Husband died at the age of 72 he appeared to be quite unremarkable in every way. But in his life, Husband, 'The Monster of Medomsley' had a huge effect on countless young lives - ruining many and his actions resulted in at least three suicides. In this shocking and disturbing episode, we look at the life and crimes of Neville Husband.
